Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to water contamination, lead paint and air quality testing in New York city housing authority buildings
Summary: Relates to water contamination, lead paint and air quality testing in New York city housing authority buildings.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to water contamination, lead paint and air quality testing in New York city housing authority buildings
